channel.title: How to allow admins to trade
channel.description: hey, i am jsut wondering if you could help me code my game (PI) oriject frozn fury so that admins could trade? because right now they cant...

item.title: How to allow admins to trade
item.dc:creator: @gangbuddy gangbuddy
item.description:
@gangbuddy wrote:

Config.java (server side)
you will see this in it.

public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade? public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false; // can admins sell items? public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = false; // can admin drop items?

just change the false to true or true to false.

Read full topic
item.source: How to allow admins to trade
